newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Three Omani drug smugglers arrested in Mauritius.
newsitem.headline: Three Omani drug smugglers arrested in Mauritius.

text.p: Mauritius police said on Thursday they had arrested three drug smugglers with Omani passports and seized between two and three kg (4.4 to 6.6 lb) of heroin.
Police Commissioner Raj Dayal described it as "the catch of the decade as far as the fight against drugs is concerned".
The three men were arrested at a hotel on Wednesday night.
